Articles.Content:
With knowing that 1.0 is coming (possibly) in the next couple months, let's start hyping this out of beta release!

Rules:

No hating on others

No down-putting posts

HYPE IT UP IN HERE!

Hype train! Go:

Hype

hype

hype

hype

hype
I say in the next 5-6 weeks.

HYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPEHYPE

(keeping caps)

But a KSP post made it to the front page of Reddit!

![Vv1oXGX.png](http://i.imgur.com/Vv1oXGX.png)



YOU COULD HEAR MY CTRL+V SPAM COULDN'T YOU?!?

last part wasn't meant to be caps.
***Hype Hype Hype Hype Hype Hype Hype Hype***

> 
> But a KSP post made it to the front page of Reddit! [/QUOTE] 
> That's my post! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
> 
> Edit: How quotes do pls

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-18T04:09:06Z" title="03/18/2015 04:09  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 18, 2015</time> by Solivagant**

Isn't it kind of early for this?

Anyway, HYPE!
how much is a hype train ticket pre-order cost?

> 
> > 
> > But a KSP post made it to the front page of Reddit!
> 
>  
> That's my post! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
> 
> Edit: How quotes do pls

Fixed it for you. But yes. \*Hops on Hype Train\* Next stop, Hypeville!

There we go, had a misplaced bracket.

> 
> I say in the next 5-6 weeks.

Which is quicker than 3 to 4 (Falcon) weeks.

Expect the Hype Train to show up two weeks from now (which happens to be on a Wednesday). Should pop up on the Kerbal Space Program website with a greeting from a Kerbal Conductor/Engineer. That is all I know at present.

It's indeed a bit early for these threads, generally we close them until at the very least experimental testing has begun ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

(thread closed)
